thread.section_title: Sport Systems Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Sport Systems | www.sportsystemscanada.com
thread.title: Keith Chatwin
thread.title_full: Sport Systems reviewed by Keith Chatwin

author: Keith Chatwin
title: Keith Chatwin
text: Pleasant ordering process; very helpful and responsive. Only hiccup with the product delivered was that there was a specification that had been agreed (in this case adhesion between two segments of pads) that didn't come on the finished product. A bit of a hassle to do it myself when I expect it would have been pretty simple at the manufacturing stage.
